description: In this beginner-friendly guitar course, you’ll learn the basic chords, strumming patterns, and rhythm techniques to play your favorite songs. No prior experience required. Each session includes hands-on practice and personalized feedback to help you progress quickly.

Improve your English speaking confidence through interactive conversation sessions. This course focuses on pronunciation, vocabulary, and real-life communication skills with fun role plays and topic discussions.

This course introduces you to the core technologies of the web: HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity. By the end, you’ll have built a fully functional personal portfolio website from scratch.

Learn the art of digital painting through guided exercises and creative projects. This workshop covers brush techniques, lighting, texture, and composition using tools like Procreate and Adobe Photoshop.

Discover the joy of cooking! You’ll learn essential kitchen skills like knife handling, meal prepping, and basic recipes for everyday dishes. Ideal for beginners who want to cook healthy and tasty food at home.
This class teaches you how to use your camera in manual mode, understand exposure, framing, and lighting. Perfect for anyone who wants to turn casual photos into professional-looking shots.
Join peaceful yoga classes designed to calm your mind and strengthen your body. Includes guided meditation, breathing exercises, and light stretches to reduce stress and anxiety.

In this beginner-friendly course, you’ll explore visual design principles, color theory, and typography. Practice by creating real projects like social media posts, logos, and banners using Canva and Photoshop.
This course helps you overcome stage fear and improve your speaking presence. Learn voice control, storytelling techniques, and audience engagement strategies to deliver powerful speeches.
